Uses of Class
picard.fingerprint.Fingerprint

  • Packages that use Fingerprint 
    Package Description
    picard.fingerprint  

    • Uses of Fingerprint in picard.fingerprint

      Methods in picard.fingerprint that return types with arguments of type Fingerprint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<htsjdk.samtools.SAMReadGroupRecord,Fingerprint> FingerprintChecker.fingerprintSamFile(java.io.File samFile, htsjdk.samtools.util.IntervalList loci)
      Generates a Fingerprint per read group in the supplied SAM file using the loci provided in the interval list.
      java.util.Map<htsjdk.samtools.SAMReadGroupRecord,Fingerprint> FingerprintChecker.fingerprintSamFiles(java.util.Collection<java.io.File> files, int threads, int waitTime, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit waitTimeUnit)
      Fingerprints one or more SAM/BAM files at all available loci within the haplotype map, using multiple threads to speed up the processing.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Fingerprint> FingerprintChecker.identifyContaminant(java.io.File samFile, double contamination, int locusMaxReads)
      Generates a per-sample Fingerprint for the contaminant in the supplied SAM file.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Fingerprint> FingerprintChecker.loadFingerprints(java.io.File fingerprintFile, java.lang.String specificSample)
      Loads genotypes from the supplied file into one or more Fingerprint objects and returns them in a Map of Sample->Fingerprint.
      static java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,Fingerprint> FingerprintChecker.mergeFingerprintsBySample(java.util.Collection<Fingerprint> inputs)
      Takes a collection of fingerprints and, assuming that they are independent, merged the fingerprints by samples and totals up the probabilities.
      Methods in picard.fingerprint with parameters of type Fingerprint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MatchResults FingerprintChecker.calculateMatchResults(Fingerprint observedFp, Fingerprint expectedFp)
      Compares two fingerprints and calculates a MatchResults object which contains detailed information about the match (or mismatch) between fingerprints including the LOD score for whether or not the two are likely from the same sample.
      static MatchResults FingerprintChecker.calculateMatchResults(Fingerprint observedFp, Fingerprint expectedFp, double minPExpected, double pLoH)
      Compares two fingerprints and calculates a MatchResults object which contains detailed information about the match (or mismatch) between fingerprints including the LOD score for whether or not the two are likely from the same sample.
      void Fingerprint.merge(Fingerprint other)
      Merges the likelihoods from the supplied Fingerprint into the likelihoods for this fingerprint.
      Method parameters in picard.fingerprint with type arguments of type Fingerprint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      htsjdk.samtools.util.IntervalList FingerprintChecker.getLociToGenotype(java.util.Collection<Fingerprint> fingerprints)
      Takes a set of fingerprints and returns an IntervalList containing all the loci that can be productively examined in sequencing data to compare to one or more of the fingerprints.
      static java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,Fingerprint> FingerprintChecker.mergeFingerprintsBySample(java.util.Collection<Fingerprint> inputs)
      Takes a collection of fingerprints and, assuming that they are independent, merged the fingerprints by samples and totals up the probabilities.
